games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: Embark on a journey as Link to save the kingdom of Hyrule from the evil Calamity Ganon.

games.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: Follow Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as he searches for his adopted daughter in a vast open world.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: Experience the end of the Wild West era as outlaw Arthur Morgan in this epic tale of loyalty and redemption.

games.title: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: Join Mario on a globe-trotting adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans.

games.title: Dark Souls III
games.description: Face challenging enemies and explore dark fantasy landscapes in the third installment of the critically acclaimed series.

games.title: Persona 5
games.description: Assume the role of a high school student in Tokyo who moonlights as a Phantom Thief to change the hearts of corrupt adults.

games.title: Minecraft
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
games.description: Build, explore, and survive in a blocky world where the only limit is your imagination.

games.title: The Last of Us Part II
games.description: Follow Ellie's journey of revenge in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by hostile humans and infected creatures.

games.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake
games.description: Relive the iconic story of Cloud Strife and his allies as they battle against the evil Shinra corporation in this reimagining of a classic.

games.title: Among Us
games.description: Work together with crewmates to complete tasks and identify the impostors among you in this multiplayer party game.

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Navigate the dystopian Night City as V, a mercenary outlaw, in this highly anticipated RPG from the creators of The Witcher series.

games.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
games.description: Embark on an epic journey as the Dragonborn to save Skyrim from dragons and discover your destiny as the hero of legend.

games.title: Grand Theft Auto V
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360
games.description: Explore the sprawling open world of Los Santos and Blaine County in this critically acclaimed crime epic.

games.title: Fortnite
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS
games.description: Drop into a colorful world and compete to be the last one standing in this free-to-play battle royale phenomenon.

games.title: League of Legends
games.description: Choose from a diverse cast of champions and battle it out on Summoner's Rift in this highly popular multiplayer online battle arena game.

games.title: Call of Duty: Warzone
games.description: Jump into the intense action of Verdansk and fight to be the last squad standing in this free-to-play battle royale mode.

games.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.description: Create your own island paradise and live life at your own pace in this charming and relaxing life simulation game.

games.title: FIFA 22
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One
games.description: Experience the excitement of football with realistic gameplay and updated features in the latest installment of the FIFA series.

games.title: Overwatch
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
games.description: Join a team of heroes and compete in fast-paced multiplayer matches to achieve victory in this team-based shooter.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One
games.description: Explore the Viking Age as Eivor, a fierce Viking warrior, and lead your clan to glory in the ninth century England.

games.title: Halo Infinite
games.platform: PC, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One
games.description: Master Chief returns in an epic campaign to save humanity from the Banished and uncover the mysteries of Zeta Halo.

games.title: God of War
games.description: Embark on a journey with Kratos and his son Atreus through the realms of Norse mythology in this critically acclaimed epic.

games.title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
games.description: Engage in tactical multiplayer battles as either terrorists or counter-terrorists in this popular competitive shooter.

games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
games.description: Embark on a legendary quest as Link to rescue Princess Zelda and stop the evil Ganondorf from obtaining the Triforce.

games.title: Doom Eternal
games.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Stadia
games.description: Unleash hell as the Doom Slayer and battle against hordes of demons from Hell in this fast-paced and brutal shooter.

games.title: Pokémon Sword and Shield
games.description: Embark on a journey to become the Champion of the Galar region and catch, train, and battle Pokémon in the Wild Area.

games.title: World of Warcraft
games.description: Enter the world of Azeroth and join millions of players in the epic adventure of World of Warcraft.

games.title: The Sims 4
games.description: Create unique Sims, build dream homes, and explore vibrant worlds in this popular life simulation game.

games.title: Genshin Impact
games.description: Embark on an epic journey across the fantasy world of Teyvat and uncover the secrets of the Seven.
